pageProps.children: {"type":"Layout","key":null,"props":{"title":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"The Lion, the Witch, the Wardrobe"}},"subtitle":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"Chapter 1: Lucy and the Wardrobe"}},"children":[{"type":"Seo","key":null,"props":{}},{"type":"div","key":null,"props":{"className":"flex flex-col items-center","children":[{"type":"div","key":null,"props":{"className":"textbox","children":{"type":"StudyNote","key":null,"props":{"className":"","note":{"type":"Symbol(react.fragment)","key":null,"props":{"children":"be inquisitive"}},"children":[{"type":"p","key":"0","props":{"children":"短语“be inquisitive”意味着要具有强烈的好奇心，喜欢追问或探求新事物和信息。"}},"\n",{"type":"p","key":"2","props":{"children":"英文例句：Children are naturally inquisitive, always asking questions and exploring their surroundings."}},"\n"]}}}},{"type":"audio","key":null,"props":{"className":"py-3","src":"https://github.com/YuantianDing/yuantianding.github.io/raw/refs/heads/main/en/src/pages/notes/thechroniclesofnarnia/wardrobe/2/_allnotes.mp3","controls":true}}]}}]}}
